comments.author: Tobias Bocanegra
comments.body:
will create:
jackrabbit
+ api  --> jackrabbit-api-1.0-dev.jar
+ commons --> jackrabbit-commons-1.0-dev.jar
+ core --> jackrabbit-core-1.0-dev.jar

please note, that the commons is not called commons-jackrabbit.jar since this should not be
confused with a jackarta commons lib.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: This change was reverted in revision 280348 after a related discussion and vote on the Jackrabbit mailing list. See the vote at http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.comp.apache.jackrabbit.devel/3441.
